product_name: SealLine Medium HP Map Case - 16" x 14.5"
long_description: The medium-size, watertight SealLine HP map case is perfect for adventure racing, cycling and boating. It offers PVC-free visibility, versatility and durability. Keep your maps and trail notes dry with this waterproof case, sized to accommodate evenly folded USGS maps and ISS charts. High-performance map case is built with a rip-and-stick, roll-down closure for waterproof submersible integrity. Trimmed with lash tabs to connect to kayak deck webbing or backpack. Pliable, transparent urethane construction lets you navigate in any weather. Interior dimensions: 15 x 13 in.
short_description: The medium-size, watertight SealLine HP map case is perfect for adventure racing, cycling and boating. It offers PVC-free visibility, versatility and durability.
